issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This issue is not a regression,reproducible in 2.1.0 GA

Steps to Reproduce:
 1. Make a default app in the studio. 
2. Copy the contents from "/Users/user-name/Library/Application Support/Titanium/modules/commonjs/ti.cloud/2.1.0/examples" to resources.
 3. Publish it for mobile web production.
 4. Type in the url to where you are hosting the mobile web app.
 5. You will see the app fire up.
6. Goto reviews--> create reviews.
 7. Enter the name or text for the review. 
8. Move the slider to any of the two ends.
9.Notice that we can not move them from the two ends any more.they are stuck there.

Actual Result:In firefox,the slider gets stuck at the ends of the sliderbar after moving it to any of the two ends. 

Expected Result: In firefox,the slider should not get stuck at the ends of the sliderbar after moving it to any of the two ends.
fields.summary: MobileWeb : ACS analytics(reviews) : In firefox(windows 7),the slider gets stuck at the ends of the sliderbar after moving it to any of the two ends.
fields.environment:
Tested On:
Titanium studio : 2.1.1.201207171343
SDK version : 2.1.1.v20120723131610
Firefox 14.0.x - win 7 desktop

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed and lack of progress. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
